data.text:
@katiecouric @StSmallerie @JGreenblattADL Okay. So let me get this straight. 
Trump puts Jared in charge of "creating Middle-east peace."

While he (Trump) goes around America inciting violence & racism everywhere.

So how are Middle-easterners supposed to take Jarod seriously?
@katiecouric @JGreenblattADL Thank you ❤️😢 I always appreciate your perspective.

@katiecouric @JGreenblattADL I know Jonathan from the days of cheering on our boys playing soccer.  And I’ve loved watching Katie for years...listening to this made me proud of both of you! Jonathan, keep it up. My heart is with you.

@katiecouric @JGreenblattADL Like Maddow pointed out tonight there is no leadership in 1600 Pennsylvania Avenue and we will not get it so let’s look to others who are helping and doing the right thing. We are better than this and there are more of us standing up and demanding what’s right and we’ll succeed
